name: part_002
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei  2nd solo live ＂Shout in Crisis＂ [USmUfG_-Sn8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Commercial for Bushiroad and Weiß Schwarz featuring hololive production.
Commercial for Miru-hako by JOYSOUND, showing ways to enjoy live viewing and movies in karaoke boxes.
Pre-live information loop showing concert merchandise and venue attendance instructions.

subtitles.original: ブシロード！
subtitles.english: Bushiroad!

subtitles.original: ヴァイスシュヴァルツ！
subtitles.english: Weiß Schwarz!

subtitles.original: ホロライブプロダクションが、またまたカードに大集合！
subtitles.english: Hololive Production is gathering on cards once again!

subtitles.original: 広がる、ヴァイスシュヴァルツ。
subtitles.english: Expanding, Weiß Schwarz.

subtitles.original: ブースターパック『ホロライブプロダクション』Vol.2、3月24日(金)発売！
subtitles.english: Booster Pack "Hololive Production" Vol.2, on sale Friday, March 24!

subtitles.original: ブシロード！
subtitles.english: Bushiroad!

subtitles.original: みるハコ。新しい生活様式で楽しもう！
subtitles.english: Miru-hako. Let's enjoy with a new lifestyle!

subtitles.original: ライブやフェスに行きたいな～
subtitles.english: I want to go to concerts and festivals...

subtitles.original: だったら、みるハコ！
subtitles.english: In that case, Miru-hako!

subtitles.original: 大音量のライブ・ビューイングが思いっきり楽しめる！
subtitles.english: You can fully enjoy high-volume live viewing!

subtitles.original: 映画を大きい画面で見たいな～
subtitles.english: I want to watch movies on a big screen...

subtitles.original: だったら、みるハコ！
subtitles.english: In that case, Miru-hako!

subtitles.original: 大画面のモニターで映画やアニメを楽しもう！
subtitles.english: Enjoy movies and anime on a large monitor!

subtitles.original: みるハコなら、カラオケボックスで音楽ライブや映画が楽しめる！
subtitles.english: With Miru-hako, you can enjoy music concerts and movies in a karaoke room!

subtitles.original: ライブ・ビューイングも！
subtitles.english: Live viewing, too!

subtitles.original: お近くのジョイサウンドで！みるハコ。
subtitles.english: At your local Joysound! Miru-hako.

subtitles.original: hololive production OFFICIAL SHOP / Geek Jackにてライブグッズ販売中！
subtitles.english: Live merchandise now on sale at hololive production OFFICIAL SHOP and Geek Jack!

subtitles.original: 各楽曲のテイスト・演出に合わせてペンライトのカラーを切り替えて、会場演出のお手伝いをお願いします。
subtitles.english: Please help with the venue's production by switching penlight colors to match the style and staging of each song.

subtitles.original: Hoshimachi Suisei 2nd Solo Live "Shout in Crisis" 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: Hoshimachi Suisei 2nd Solo Live "Shout in Crisis" - The performance will begin shortly

subtitles.original: My name is Teddy Powers and I sing with Soul Chance for Gospel.
subtitles.english: My name is Teddy Powers and I sing with Soul Chance for Gospel.

subtitles.original: When you fell on us, you created quite a stir for us girls.
subtitles.english: When you fell on us, you created quite a stir for us girls.

subtitles.original: And this song is even much better than...
subtitles.english: And this song is even much better than...
